author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

@schneiml reported in #27291 (thanks!) that contrary to the documentation https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/FWMultithreadedFrameworkStreamModuleInterface#edm_EndLuminosityBlockProducer, currently `globalEndLuminosityBlockProduce()` function is called before `globalEndLuminosityBlockSummary()` (when combining `edm::EndLuminosityBlockProducer` and `edm::LuminosityBlockSummaryCache<T>` extensions). This PR fixes the ordering of these functions for both LuminosityBlocks and Runs for global/limited/stream EDProducers and EDFilters, and extends the unit tests with a check for the calling order of these two functions. This PR also extends the module transition tests to EDFilters for stream/limited/global modules.

Fixes #27291.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, FWCore unit tests run.
title: Fix globalEnd{LuminosityBlock,Run}Summary() to be called before globalEnd{LuminosityBlock,Run}Produce()
